newsitem.title: USA: National Tech sees revs, shr up for year.
newsitem.headline: National Tech sees revs, shr up for year.

text.p: National Technical Systems Inc said Tuesday that it expects earnings per share from continuing operations for the fiscal year January 31, 1997 to be between $0.29 and $0.32 on revenues of $46 to $48 million.
The company said that it discontinued its environmental services division as of January 16, 1997 and will report an after-tax loss from that operation of about $700,000.
For the fiscal year ended January 31, 1996, revenues were $44.4 million, with net income of $919,000, or $0.14 per share.
The previous-period results will be restated to reflect the discontinuance of the environmental operation.
